name: df-oexp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(coe, cmpo(s0, s1, con0, con0, cif(cdif(c1o, cv(s1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s2, universe, co(cv(s2), comu, cv(s0))), c1o), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))))

comment: Define the ordinal exponentiation operation. (Contributed by NM, 30-Dec-2004.)
